metadata.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach on finding Last Light overrun by shadows. Anyone who was present within succumbed to the shadow curse.

2.speaker: Halsin
2.text: All gone... devoured by the shadows. Oak Father preserve us, it's just like a hundred years ago.
2.context: NodeContext: Aghast at the loss of life/instantly brought back to a similar incident years ago when his comrades died.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Stay strong, bear man. We're still here.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: We are. Yet there is a burden to being the survivor... the witness to others' tragedies. It only grows heavier with time.
